85 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
86 // Class stDFNode
87 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
112 class stDFNode{
113 
114  public:
115 
119  enum stDFNodeType{
123  INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
124 
128  LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
129  };//end stNodeType
130 
134  virtual ~stDFNode(){
135  }//end ~stDFNode()
136 
143  stNodeType GetNodeType(){
144  return Header->Type;
145  }//end GetNodeType
146 
152  stPage * GetPage(){
153  return Page;
154  }//end GetPage
155 
161  stPageID GetPageID(){
162  return Page->GetPageID();
163  }//end GetPage
164 
171  static stDFNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
172 
181  stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
182  return this->Header->Occupation;
183  }//end GetNumberOfEntries
184 
196  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
197 
208  virtual const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx) = 0;
209 
220  virtual stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx) = 0;
221 
225  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius() = 0;
226 
230  void RemoveAll(){
231 
232  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
233  stNodeType type;
234  type = Header->Type;
235  Page->Clear();
236  Header->Type = type;
237  #else
238  this->Header->Occupation = 0;
239  #endif //__stDEBUG__
240  }//end RemoveAll
241 
245  virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount() = 0;
246 
250  static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
251  return sizeof(stDFNodeHeader);
252  }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
253 
254  protected:
258  #pragma pack(1)
259  typedef struct stDFNodeHeader{
263  stNodeType Type;
264 
268  stCount Occupation;
269  } stDFNodeHeader; //end stHeader
270  #pragma pack()
271 
275  stDFNodeHeader * Header;
276 
280  stPage * Page;
281 
287  stDFNode(stPage * page){
288  this->Page = page;
289  Header = (stDFNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
290  }//end stDFNode
291 };//end stDFNode

293 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
294 // Class stDFIndexNode
295 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
325 // +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
326 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | GRDist0 | NEnt0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn | GRDistn | NEntn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
327 // +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
328 class stDFIndexNode: public stDFNode{
329 
330  public:
331 
336  #pragma pack(1)
337  typedef struct stDFIndexEntry{
341  stPageID PageID;
342 
346  stDistance Distance;
347 
351  stDistance * FieldDistance;
352 
356  stCount NEntries;
357 
361  stDistance Radius;
362 
368  stSize Offset;
369  } stDFIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
370  #pragma pack()
371 
383  stDFIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
384 
398  stDFIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(stCount idx){
399  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
400  if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
401  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
402  }//end if
403  #endif //__stDEBUG__
404 
405  return Entries[idx];
406  }//end GetIndexEntry
407 
426  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
427 
431  int GetRepresentativeEntry();

455

465

470

480  return sizeof(stDFIndexEntry);
481  }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
482 
483  private:
484

489 
493  stSize GetFree();
494 
495 };//end stDFIndexPage

527 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | GRDist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | GRDistn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
528 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
529 class stDFLeafNode: public stDFNode{
530 
531  public:
532 
536  #pragma pack(1)
537  typedef struct stDFLeafEntry{
541  stDistance Distance;
542 
546  stDistance * FieldDistance;
547 
553  stSize Offset;
554  } stDFLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
555  #pragma pack()
556 
568  stDFLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
569 
583  stDFLeafEntry &GetLeafEntry(stCount idx){
584  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
585  if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
586  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
587  }//end if
588  #endif //__stDEBUG__
589 
590  return Entries[idx];
591  }//end GetLeafEntry
592 
611  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
612 
616  int GetRepresentativeEntry();
617 
628  const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);

639  stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
640 
651  void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
652 
656  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
657 
661  virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount(){
662  return GetNumberOfEntries();
663  }//end GetTotalObjectCount()
664 
668  static stSize GetLeafEntryOverhead(){
669  return sizeof(stDFLeafEntry);
670  }//end GetLeafEntryOverhead()
671 
678  stDistance * GetFieldDistance(stCount idx){
679  return Entries[idx].FieldDistance;
680  }//end GetFieldDistance
681 
682  private:
683 
687  stDFLeafEntry * Entries;
688 
692  stSize GetFree();
693 
694 };//end stDFLeafNode

696 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
697 // Class stDFMemLeafNode
698 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
717 template < class ObjectType >
718 class stDFMemLeafNode{
719 
720  public:
721 
728  stDFMemLeafNode(stDFLeafNode * leafNode);
729 
738  stDFLeafNode * ReleaseNode();
739 
750  bool Add(ObjectType * obj, stDistance distance);
751 
755  stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
756  return this->NumEntries;
757  }//end GetNumberOfObjects
758 
766  ObjectType * ObjectAt(stCount idx){
767  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
768  if (idx >= this->numEntries){
769  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
770  }//end if
771  #endif //__stDEBUG__
772  return Entries[idx].Object;
773  }//end ObjectAt
774 
781  ObjectType * LastObject(){
782  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Object;
783  }//end LastObject
784 
790  ObjectType * RepObject(){
791  return Entries[0].Object;
792  }//end RepObject
793 
800  stDistance DistanceAt(stCount idx){
801  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
802  if (idx >= this->numEntries){
803  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
804  }//end if
805  #endif //__stDEBUG__
806 
807  return Entries[idx].Distance;
808  }//end DistanceAt
809 
814  stDistance LastDistance(){
815  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
816  }//end LastDistance
817 
824  ObjectType * Remove(stCount idx);
825 
829  ObjectType * PopObject();
830 
836  bool CanAdd(ObjectType * obj){
837  // Does it fit ?
838  if (obj->GetSerializedSize() + stDFLeafNode::GetLeafEntryOverhead() +
839  this->UsedSize > this->MaximumSize){
840  // No, it doesn't.
841  return false;
842  }//end if
843  // yes, it does.
844  return true;
845  }//end CanAdd
846 
852  stDistance GetMinimumRadius(){
853  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
854  }//end GetMinimumRadius
855 
861  stSize GetFreeSize(){
862  return (this->maximumSize - this->usedSize);
863  }//end GetFreeSize
864 
865  private:
866 
870  struct stDFMemNodeEntry{
874  ObjectType * Object;
875 
879  stDistance Distance;
880  };
881 
885  stCount NumEntries;
886 
890  stCount Capacity;
891 
895  stDFMemNodeEntry * Entries;
896 
900  stSize MaximumSize;
901 
905  stSize UsedSize;
906 
910  stDFLeafNode * SrcLeafNode;
911 
920  int InsertPosition(stDistance distance);
921 
926  void Resize(stCount incSize = 16);
927 
928 };//end stDFMemLeafNode
